words.etymology_text: Internationalism. Compare English chai latte. Initial part ultimately from Persian چای (čây) (compare tsaikku), the latter from Italian (caffè) latte. Coined in 1994.

raw_glosses: (colloquial, jargon) Clipping of chai latte (“chai latte”).

words.etymology_text: From Sanskrit चक्र (cakrá, “wheel, circle, cycle; chakra”), using the English spelling. Distant doublet of kaula and kekri.
